altername_name: Simple 2500 Series Portable Vol. 8: The Doko Demo Gal Mahjong
name: Simple 2500 Series Portable Vol. 8: The Dokodemo Girl Mahjong
overview: Here is a Mahjong game that is rare. You only get to do One-On-One Matches. You get to play with a Beautiful girl. Graphically The game is fantastic. It's fun, but doesn't have the Four Player matches that would make this game even better.
